title.title: heads up! Zompot token will be available for pre-sale ın
title.presale-token-price:
A colorful, magical manga art virtual world for fans,
NFT collectors, artists, and content creators

welcome.title:
You are welcome to the
                        wonderful world Zompot token Ecosystem!
welcome.content:
This is a unique market in which we may investigate how to empower users of our product by
                        imagining new methods that benefit themselves as well as other people.

why.title: Why Us
why.content:
With Zompot, your investment will always be protected against inflation in a secure platform
                        while giving you the flexibility of its usage.
why.content2:
With its successful protocol, Zompot aims to lead a new era in both fiat and blockchain
                        economies which will impact the newcomers to the market to a stable and improving strategy.
                        Zompot targets to solve the issues with a flexible policy and stable pricing strategy, making
                        itself viable for use in the everyday lives of its users so that they will not only be using the
                        token but also benefit by being investors.

about.title: About Zompot
about.content:
Zompot is created to lead the market! It aims to create safe and secure investment
                            options
                            for
                            its investors.
about.content2:
As a fungible token on BEP20, all units of a currency will remain equal. When you receive the money within a currency, it will not come with any history from the previous users of the currency or the users should have an easy way to disassociate themselves from that history, thus keeping all coins equal.
                            At the same time, any user will be able to act as an auditor to guarantee the financial integrity of the public ledger without compromising others' privacy. Zompot tackles privacy issues by unlinking transactions from the payment’s origin.
                            The protocol will issue Zompot currencies pegged to USD, EUR, GBP, CNY, JPY and the IMF SDR. Over time, more currencies will be added to the list by user voting. The system supports atomic swaps among Zompot currencies at their market exchange rates.

market.title: NFT MARKETPLACE
market.content: Zompot token formulates and constructs decentralized anonymous payment schemes (DAP schemes).
market.content2:
In Zompot’s system, a unique valid snapshot of the currency’s ledger is available to all users
                        at any given time. The construction allows users to mint, merge, and split coins.
                        Zompot is a concrete implementation based on robust strategy and planning. It entails carefully
                        instantiating the cryptographic ingredients of the construction to ensure that the heaviest
                        component, is efficient enough in practice.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics

                development phase.
